Messages.Wins are calculated by counting consecut: Wins are calculated by counting the number of consecutive reels with matching symbols then multiplying by the total number of matching symbols on each of those reels.

Messages.Wild appears on the 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5t: Wild Stars appears on the reels 2,3,4,5. It simultaneously counts as all non wild symbols. Wilds Stars have a high chance of appearing on tumbles.

It simultaneously counts as all non wild symbols

Messages.The sticky wild will only appear on the: The Sticky Wild will only appear on reel 3 and will not disappear when it is part of a winning combination. It will tumble down if symbols below it disappear otherwise it works like a Wild Star

Messages.The expanding wild has a random chance t: The Expanding Wild has a random chance to appear on reel 2, 3, 4, 5. They substitute for all symbols and can appear on multiple reels at the same time.

Messages.Freespins are reached by having multiple: Free Spins are reached by having multiple successive tumbles. A minimum of 4 tumbles is required to trigger Free Spins. The base Free Spin game is 14 Free Spins with no Starting Multiplier. For each additional successive win after 4 you will gain extra Free Spins or multipliers, up to a maximum of 20 Free Spins and 6 Starting Multiplier

Messages.Inside free spins the game is similar to: Inside Free Spins the game is similar to the base game except that each tumble increments the multiplier by 1. The multiplier applies to the current spin win. There is no sticky wild or expanding wild inside Free Spins.

Messages.Red berry: Appears once on each 5 reels: Red berry: Appears once on each of 5 consecutive reels (including wild). So the payout is the flat value for 5x Red Berry, 10 coins so payout is 10 * 1 * 1 * 1 * 1 * 1 = 10 coins.

Messages.Orange berry: Appears on each 5 reels. A:
Orange Berry: Appears on each of 5 consecutive reels. The prize for 5 Orange Berrys is 15. Orange Berry appears once on reel 1, twice on reel 2, twice on reel 3 (including wild), once on reel 4 and twice on reel 5,
so payout is 15 * 1 * 2 * 2 * 1 * 2 = 120 coins.

Messages.More than one wild reel can be displayed: More than one Expanding Wild can be displayed on the reels at the same time.

Messages.A free tumble has been interrupted: A free tumble has been interrupted

Messages.Successive Winnings trigger Free Spins: 4 or more Successive Tumble Wins trigger Free Spins

Messages.Win up to 20 FS with x5 multiplier: Win up to 20 Free Spins with x6 Starting Multiplier

Messages.4 Successive Winnings Trigger 14 FS:
4 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers
14 Free Spins

Messages.5 Successive Winnings Trigger 16 FS:
5 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers
16 Free Spins

Messages.6 Successive Winnings Trigger 16 FS\n+x2:
6 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers
16 FS +x3 Starting Multiplier

Messages.7 Successive Winnings Trigger 20 FS\n+x2:
7 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers
20 FS +x3 Starting Multiplier

Messages.6 Successive Winnings Trigger 20 FS\n+x5:
8 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers
20 FS +x6 Starting Multiplier

Messages.6 Successive Winnings Triggers 16 FS + 2: 6 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers 16 FS + 3x Starting Multiplier

Messages.7 Successive Winnings Triggers 20 FS + 2: 7 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers 20 FS + 3x Starting Multiplier

Messages.8 Successive Winnings Triggers 20 FS + 5: 8 Successive Tumble Wins Triggers 20 FS + 6x Starting Multiplier

Messages.Wild Increasing Hand Multiplier (it incr: Free Spins Increasing win Multiplier (it increments by 1 for each win)

Messages.Whenever a win way pays out the symbols: Whenever a Win Way pays out the symbols are destroyed and all remaining symbols tumble down.

Messages.All destroyed symbols are replaced with: All destroyed symbols are replaced with symbols from higher up on the reels with a high chance of extra Wild Stars appearing.

Messages.If the new symbols also form a win way t: If the new symbols also form a Win Way they too will pay out and more symbols will tumble in to replace them, this will continue until no more Win Ways can be made.
